root.title: compani set bid canada helicopt contract
root.body: e.h. industri canada inc sai plan bid eh101 helicopt replac canada fleet sea king aircraft sai join bell textron canada canadian marconu co cmw imp group paramax electron inc support augusta s.p.a. sikorski aircraft westland group bid eh101 aim detect engag submarin design us british italian navi due enter servic 1992 e.h. sai
